PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-12082009-07-30INDUSTRY,  ,  ,  , 
ActBankruptcy and Insolvency Act
SubjectRules Amending the Bankruptcy and Insolvency General Rules
PrecisRULES AMENDING THE BANKRUPTCY AND INSOLVENCY GENERAL RULES to provide certainty and clarity for stakeholders with respect to recent amendments to insolvency legislation by adding definitions and standardizing information to be provided under the Bankruptcy and Insolvency Act. They also streamline the administrative burden particularly for trustees in bankruptcy.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0218 Publication Date: 2009-08-19
AttachmentsAttachment
